text: Significant Others is an American drama television series that aired on the Fox Network from March 11 to March 25, 1998. The series was created and executive produced by Christopher Keyser and Amy Lippman. ==Summary== The series centered on Henry Callaway, Cambell Chasen, and Nell Glennon, three twenty-something friends living in Los Angeles. Other stars included Michael Weatherly, Elizabeth Mitchell, Gigi Rice, and Richard Masur. Only three episodes were shown before cancellation, although six episodes were produced. ==Cast== * Scott Bairstow as Henry Callway * Eion Bailey as Cambell Chasen * Jennifer Garner as Nell Glennon * Michael Weatherly as Ben Chasen * Elizabeth Mitchell as Jane Merril-Chasen * Richard Masur as Leonard Chasen * Gigi Rice as Charlotte ==Episodes== ==DVD release== Sony Pictures Home Entertainment released the entire series, including the unaired episodes, on DVD in Region 1 in 2004 after Jennifer Garner had gained fame on the TV series Alias.'98 Series w/Jennifer Garner announced by studio .
